articles.content: If you plan on pre-ordering Verizon’s Galaxy S20 5G ahead of the official June 4 release, you can now take advantage of a hefty discount by pre-ordering the phone from Best Buy. The so-called Galaxy … [+1107 chars]

articles.author: Malcolm Owen
articles.title: Compared: Dell XPS 15 and XPS 17 versus Apple's 16-inch MacBook Pro - AppleInsider
articles.description: Dell's new XPS 15 and XPS 17 lines are a direct competitor to Apple's 16-inch MacBook Pro, but are the rival notebooks any match for Apple's top-of-the-range model? On paper, it could be too close to call.
